website_summaries.verdict: One of the few stabilizer jacks designed for securing larger, 5th-wheel style RVs and trailers.
pros: Large tripod base keeps the jack up and secure in bad weather
Includes leg chains to prevent the base from overextending while setting up
Telescopic head is easy to adjust to the right height
cons: Steel tubing can rust over time if the paint begins to wear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great.... My wife and I couldn't have sex in the RV if we had guest staying with us. After installing the stabilizer there's no shaking at all.
customer_reviews.author: chad m fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Stable nights
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that I bought this based on the review written by the couple that is now able to have sex in their fifth wheel without their guests knowing....LOL. It does work as it is supposed to, however, we may be a little more active as the trailer does shake a little under aerobic workout conditions! It does add quite a bit of needed stability and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Muffles the frisky freaky time.....
customer_reviews.text: So like several other people I bought the tripod because I too don't want the whole rv park to know when the wifey and I are feeling frisky. Happy to say it does make the 5th wheel more stable. Now thinking of getting more freaky, just until we're asked to leave the park due to family moral value/ quite time violations. A swing perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: QueensJoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, no more rocking
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Eaz-lift stabalizer for the 5th wheel we have. I was tired of walking around and feeling like I had sea legs all the time. Even with the back stabalizer jacks down our 5th wheel still had movement. This really did the trick. High quality materials and looked identiical to the name brand but at a cheaper price. Happy with our purchase, now our RV doesn't rock and roll! Easy to determine the height needed, just measure from the ground up to your king pin. Sturdy legs, easy to adjust coupler to fit needed height, then tighten the chain through the legs when you get your height set and legs set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this king pin almost a month now. I am very impressed! We are full timers in our 40 foot fifth wheel with a 3 year old and a 6 month old. We are currently located in West Texas where it is quite windy at times to where our fifth wheel shakes more than I like. Purchased this tripod in hopes of solving the issue. I can say it has helped TREMENDOUSLY!! Winds have to gust over 25 before I even know it’s blowing! And even then the shaking it’s at minium! I feel my toddlers bouncing less as well! I definitely recommend purchasing this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: 41' 5th wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 41' 5th wheel with 4 bump outs and an issue with a bit of rocking. I bought this to help with the stability and it works great! Thanks Eaz-Lift
customer_reviews.author: BJohnson

customer_reviews.title: High quality construction, quick shipment and great results.
customer_reviews.text: The quality construction of this stabilizer was unexpected for the price. Very easy to put together and use. I could feel the improved stability in the master bedroom of my 5th wheel right away. The box it was shipped in was sturdy and well packaged. If you are in the market for one of these...this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Important addition to my 5th wheel (goose neck version)
customer_reviews.text: I have a washer and dryer in my 5th wheel and this made my entire rig more stable. Did it remove all the shaking from the washer, no. But made a very noticeable difference and I would definitely buy this knowing what I know, after having used it for month now. FYI: I have a 35 foot Grand Design Solitude with the stacked washer and Dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have a 34' fifth wheel and this works great. I would estimate it reduces the swaying as people move around the camper by 75% especially when moving around the upper bedroom where the pin box is located. It doesn't completely eliminate it but it does reduce it significantly. This brand is well made and very rugged. I usually give it 2-3 full turns after contact with the pin. If you don't put a lot of weight on it the swaying won't be significantly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great value, really keeps everything stable
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this because of some of the other funny reviews I read. It does keep everything very stable and I can hardly tell when anyone is walking around the fifth wheel. We have a 43ft Heartland Cyclone with 6 auto leveling stablizers, but you could still feel occasional movement. Once we added the tripod, we no lionger feel anything,
customer_reviews.author: David Lambright

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Gave us 90% more support. The master bedroom doesn’t feel like your in a water bed when someone is walking around in the coach.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken. Poor construction and wasted time I cannot get back.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. So much for quality. You would think a company like this would have quality control from their manufacturer in China. Another great reason to buy American made. I give this product and seller -10
customer_reviews.author: rhondamarie

customer_reviews.title: Kingpin tripod works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on whether this product would actually help with the vibrations from the washer that is located in the fifth wheel. I does, no it does not remove all the shaking, but it does eliminate enough to make it noticeable. It is make of sturdy materials. I purchased this particular after getting positive word of mouth from my neighbor and see a number of positive comments on at couple RV Facebook sites I follow. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Highly recommended this product.
customer_reviews.text: We had watched other people in RV parks use this type and thought it might be a good idea with our new fifth wheel. Not only a good idea but a fantastic one. The stability it created with 2 adults and 2 large dogs walking in a camper is amazing. Can't believe we didn't purchase one sooner. To store it we use a blanket and roll it up, fits fine in the pass through storage area. It is so easy to set up too.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynAmos

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable how well this works
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time and I am so impressed on the difference it makes. I was staying in Bodega Bay and the first day there the wind really came up. I was used to having my 28 ft fifth wheel rock a little in the wind and therefore I noticed right away when it didn't rock at all. It almost felt like I was attached to a foundation. I could not be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NevaDan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Reese Goose Box!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 42-foot 5th wheel with a Reese Goose Box, instead of the traditional kingpin box. This stabilizer is easy to put together and attached to our Goose Box. The included tow ball attachment is strong and well-made. This stabilizer is designed for those who uses either the traditional goose neck or Reese Goose Box. It is NOT designed for the traditional king pin!!
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna AZ

customer_reviews.title: Best money I've spent on my 5th wheel
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product! I have a 25 ft Prowler, and it used to shake a lot when it was windy. Ever since buying and using this stabilzer, it's almost as solid as a house. Easy to assemble and install, and makes a huge difference in the stability of the trailer when parked. One caveat- the holes drilled in the cup to lock it are almost useless. I drilled an additional hole straight across, and use a 5th wheel hitch lock to secure it, with a long hitch pin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Hosburg

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: Really helps keep the front of the 5th wheel stable. It's a bit large and heavy, but stability comes with a price. I purchased a Christmas tree bag (from Amazon of course) to put it in and keep the receiver to the pin in a gallon zip bag because it's greasy and dirty. Good purchase, good product, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong this tripod stabilized the trailer so much from moving while you walk I was amazed.
customer_reviews.text: Wife made me buy this tripod for our fifthwheel as she had seen them on others while we travel. I was sceptic as I figured it was one more thing we didn’t need. I was wrong this tripod stabilized the trailer so much from moving while you walk I was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fifth wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that really helps keeping my fifth wheel stable while parked. I only wish it was a little bit longer for times when the surface is on a descending grade and the front end of the trailer is propped up higher. I had to use blocks underneath so it would reach the kingpin. Other than that, it is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gann

customer_reviews.title: Low Price for Stability
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Helps to stabilize the bedroom of the 5th wheel RV when the camp site is not ideal. No more shimmy or shake when moving around in the bedroom or bathroom. Price was unbelievably low for such a heavy piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: speycast4steelhead

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good purchase. I purchased it on Amazon prime day and got a discount on it but would definitely pay the full price for it. It even has a little remote that helps take photos by connecting to the Bluetooth on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Christi

customer_reviews.title: great stabilizer just too short
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stabilizer for the Anderson hitch. I only gave it a 4 out of 5 because its too short. Most stabilizer legs extend for the height of the fifth wheel. This is not usable if the pin is above about 4 ft off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Andersen hitch
customer_reviews.text: The 5th wheel hitch doesn’t work with the Andersen hitch we have on our truck and unfortunately we didn’t find this out until after the return window was over. Wish we could exchange for the gooseneck because I’d love the stability of this tripod to help our family out. But instead we wasted $87.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Must have for RVers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Does exactly what it’s intended to do. Movement from front to back no more. Also installed X chalks works exceptionally great. Must have for gooseneck attachments on 5th wheels.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works with Air Ride Pin.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 43 ft 5th wheel with an Air Ride pinbox and this fits great. No problem installing it and I love that it has a place to store the bar on the frame. It would be a Great buy if they would have included a lock for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Christensen

customer_reviews.title: stopped the shaking from a washer
customer_reviews.text: I full time in a fifth wheel with a front bedroom with washer/dryer hookups right in the front cap. So you can imagine during the spin cycle the RV felt like it was going through a 5.0 earthquake. Since installing, it's been amazing. I can still feel a shimmy but it's night and day difference between having and not having it. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to install and it increases stability
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product that adds a lot of stability to the front of my fifth wheel. I've procrastinated for a couple of years about buying a tripod jack, but now I am glad I did and it is really inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dadjim13

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped the swaying in our 5th wheel! Glad to no longer get sea sick while watching tv. Great investment. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to help stabilize my fifth wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to help stabilize my fifth wheel. I have a 38 foot toy hauler that sways a bit from side to side. Once I installed this stabilizer that movement was eliminated. The stabilizer appears to be built very sturdy and should stand up to years of use. It is very easy to get installed and removed. I think this stabilizer will help take some of the stress off of the landing gear legs since it's no longer moving from side to side. For a larger trailer I think it's a very welcomed addition. Now I can sneak out to go fishing in the morning without waking up my wife! It's well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Pierce

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try it out, end ended up loving it. I know a lot of people that don't like the chain version of these, but I like how I can fine tune much more the king pin stabilizer with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: It definitely helps with Stability!
customer_reviews.text: We just received the tripod. So far after installation which is pretty simple, we are pleasantly surprised just how much more stable we are now! My wife is much happier..the constant moving was bugging her. We definitely recommend this tripod. Our 5th wheel is 38 foot and a toyhauler if that helps any of you out. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zaloga

customer_reviews.title: This stabilizer is easy to install and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This stabilizer is easy to install and looks nice. Several people in the community ask about it and where I purchased it. It does work well as a locking mechanism to prevent theft, however it doesn't give the level of stabilizing that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Asmith

customer_reviews.title: Great Stability
customer_reviews.text: This was easy & quick to set up. It is Amazing how much that it really helps to stabilize the front of the 5th wheel RV. I would definitely recommend anyone with a goose neck adapted or regular 5th wheel RVer to get one of these stabilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference
customer_reviews.text: WOW, Tripod was delivered in 3 days. Amazing. It was easy to set up, and made a bigly difference. I don't hear my washer/dryer combo running now. I can have sex with my wife without rocking and rolling the trailer. The RV doesn't vibrate when my dog shakes his skin. Compared to other tripods, this was a great deal. Well worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Frrrrrunkis

customer_reviews.title: It works but......
customer_reviews.text: Really wasn't impressed with the product, wasn't easy to set up solo, yes I did do it by myself but the design is outdated. If I had to make the purchase all over again I think I would pass. But it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would help but it really stabilized my 40 ft fifth wheel. Easy to put together, 10 mins and i was done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Browning

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works awesome, my husband installed it onto our fifth wheel, so I don't really know how hard it was. but it didn't take him long. definitely helps cut down the swaying motion when the dogs play fetch in the camper!
customer_reviews.author: jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for 5th Wheel!
customer_reviews.text: The Eaz-Lift Gooseneck stand is an awesome investment if you have a 5th wheel. When our camper is parked in our yard we don't use the stand and it's super wobbly to walk around in. You can really tell a difference when we are camping as the front of the camper is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: my3darlings

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after reading some of the other "RV aerobics" reviews and were not disappointed. This definitely helps to stabilize our 35' toyhauler.
customer_reviews.author: Julz D.

customer_reviews.title: Too Short for a 5th wheel RV - Beware
customer_reviews.text: This does not work for a 5th wheel RV so don’t waste your money. Bought last Fall and went to use it for the first time and it is a foot too short. Too late to return now so $100 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: WillPrimeMem

customer_reviews.title: 5th wheel stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy stand from a great company that know's RV life. Very well built, works as described. Highly recommended. Used on my 2018 Keystone Sprinter
customer_reviews.author: chris rule

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Made a big difference. Took a bunch of the sway out of the front of the 5th wheel. Might want to look at the more light weight models if your going from town to town. This thing is kind of heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: NICE. . .
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very heavy duty. Stabilized our 18,000 lb 5th wheel very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Gave it 4 due to height. Wish it was more adjustable. Had to improvise to get the height needed for my 5th wheel. Very sturdy and good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Iris J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Works great. 5th wheel still sways some but I did notice some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: lisaadkins41

customer_reviews.title: Keeps rv from shaking a lot
customer_reviews.text: Well it did mostly what I wanted it for, to keep my RV from shaking so much when the washer spins, but it makes my trailer pop when you walk on the floors. I asked a man at the RV place and he told me to back off on it some and I did but it still pops. He told me they do not recommend them anymore. So I’ll try once again to rework and see how it does.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the 1st time at Thanksgiving. Really stabilized the trailer and was easy to set up. It is a very solid stabilizer. definitely work the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo of Poway

customer_reviews.title: Made of quality material.
customer_reviews.text: We use to support weight on our RV gooseneck hitch. Works well and provides stability when RV is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stuck

customer_reviews.title: Good lift if your trailer doesn’t have a shallow ball receiver.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lift for the money. I’d give it a 4 star review if the hitch ball wasn’t egg shaped which prevented me from using it on a shallow hitch receiver. I’d have ground of a quarter inch off the top and used it if I have the facilities to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This tripod was easy to assemble and secure to my RV. It packed away nicely in my RV garage. I'll have it provide an update later on after an extended stay using this device. I think this was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: GRB Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: There is a very noticeable difference when the tripod is attached. Our fifth wheel feels very sturdy when the tripod is on. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Schmaddie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is heavy duty, stabilized my 5th wheel, no more rocking in the wind.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank, my 5th wheel is 35' long and heavy, even with all the supports it rocked in the wind and when we walked in it, no more. I installed this tripod and bang, no more rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: NOT As described in the ad
customer_reviews.text: NOT what was expected, this in no way is capable of maintaining 7000 lbs for stability! Maybe 700 lbs, MAYBE The most HEAVY Duty part is the ball. If you care about your gooseneck, DON'T waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Broken Book N Broom

customer_reviews.title: ... Road Warrior trying to find what would be a good deal for me and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking and researching various stabilizers for my Road Warrior trying to find what would be a good deal for me and a quality product. I will say this is it with-out a doubt. The minute I put in in place made a few adjustments and tighten it up, there was a considerable difference that everyone noticed. Before the king pin up in the main bedroom would move around a when people traversed around the hauler and living room, NOT ANYMORE the king pin was the perfect fit. I would recommend it for other 5th wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE IN A LONG TIME!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Made a significant difference in the amount of bouncing the rig did when moving around the bedroom area. No longer feel like we are living on a boat. Would recommend to anyone with bouncing problems.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE NUNGESTER

customer_reviews.title: does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together need a couple wrenches for assembly. Its a little challenging to get the chain set up for the first time. But overall it is great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hamar

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I have used twice and must say that it seems to work fine. I could have rated it a five star, but then they would have no reason to try and improve this very good product. I wish that I could store it in the original heavy packing box, but with the feet and cup installed it is too long, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: digger

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a hassle to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Had to make adjustments on the bolts for the legs. Seems well made and strong. Took one star off because it can be a hassle setting it up, compared to our previous one (simular to 19-950200 but steel)
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Well made stabilizer, could have better hardware though. Overall made quite a difference to make the camper more stable when walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Cole A.

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for a while glad I purchased this one just as good as any of ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a while for this just as good as everyone I've ever looked at but for a cheaper price very happy with this stand
customer_reviews.author: ezekiel bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely makes a difference, but not sure it does all that the reviews state. Overall a positive, but not the end all to rocking/stability.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 2016 Keystone Raptor. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Tripod Stability
customer_reviews.text: Arrive very quickly. Installation was easy. Provided the sturdiness we needed. I’d recommend it if you are in need.
customer_reviews.author: Subroo1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews, I was convinced so made the purchase. HUGE difference that this tripod made in stabalizing our 42' fifth wheel. While it is a bit heavy, set up time is minimal taking usually a few minutes. The adjustable legs easily accomodate those 'not so level' sites as well. I would recomment this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 5th Wheel tripod
customer_reviews.text: Same thing here I bought this item more because of the previous reviews. Who doesn't like to have more sex in their 5th wheel without waking the neighbors. Just Saying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use not really heavy! Chain needs to be a little longer for times when it needs to be extended to its lowest!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the most expensive offering but works brilliantly. The added stability the tripod provides is amazing. Only comment I would make is that the feet could use to be bigger if your in a sandy site but some jack pads quickly remedy that.
customer_reviews.author: Gashog

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works good for fifth wheel support also has a spot for a lock so it doubles as a trailer pin lock
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product to stabilize your fifth wheel
customer_reviews.text: This really makes a difference in the stability of our 5er while parked at camp. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take out as much movement as I expected it to. It's solid and easy to use, so It's a solid 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow you can tell the diffrence right away.
customer_reviews.text: It made a bigger difference than I thought it would. Much more stable now. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Biosan

customer_reviews.title: Fifth wheel Stabilizer.
customer_reviews.text: The stabilizer works as stated and takes a lot of the movement out of the camper. Great product, I would recommend this product for fifth wheel owners.
customer_reviews.author: justashoppin

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay! Needs about 6 inches more adjustable thread, placing the foot pads on 4 inch concrete blocks gives the height adjustment I need.
customer_reviews.author: norma thomas

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting this to use on our 5th wheel as many reviews stated that it makes the trailer not move. It was easy to install and does help with stabilizing the 5th wheel. Our 5th wheel is 25' long. Now I will say it does not take the shake away completely, but does eliminate it tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Stops most of the movement
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how the basic design could do any better. Knocked out about 90% of front end movement on our fifth wheel. Used with Xchocks on the rear tires. Really simple to set up and store.
customer_reviews.author: SilverRider

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Works great. Could tell a big difference in the sturdiness of my camper. My bedroom is in the front, when I would roll over at night I could feel the whole camper shake. Not anymore, worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Not tall enough
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put together but, unfortunately, it doesn't telescope high enough for our rig.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I'll admit the reason I picked this one is because ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit the reason I picked this one is because of the first two reviews. We have a 38 foot toy hauler and when it is moving the old people mentioned it the next morning and our kids were really embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DARWIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent equipment, and value.
customer_reviews.text: Best value, excellent equipment, steady out the 5th wheel. Big difference!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa P

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wasn’t sure I would because of the chains instead of bars. Just what we needed for our 5th wheel. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Finally bought one
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tripod for the 5th wheel. The price was reasonable and the unit well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Batiato

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use ! Works awesome ! It doubles as a solar panel frame also !
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of the bounce out of the trailer
customer_reviews.text: I have a gooseneck hitch for my fifth wheel and this stand helped take a lot of the "bounce" out of the trailer after we unhooked. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic level stabilizer ....not the best, but it does the job. I use it for my 38' fiver with a 2,200# pin weight. Will not support the full pin weight (not supposed to), but it does a good job of eliminating the side to side sway. There are higher priced units and I've seen more elaborate units, but I can't see where they would do any better job than this one for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: wayner-Take-1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars it really does the job stabelizing my fifth wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Berry

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not y’all enough on some surfaces but easy to use and good stability!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Andersen Ultimate 5th wheel gooseneck hitch. It is too short and will not work. Discovered after the Amazon return window closed. Wasted money! 😕
customer_reviews.author: Bob 777

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product. I have been using my camper non ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I have been using my camper non stop for over a year and this is one of the best investments for my trailer
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: If the campers rockin then this product is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the camper from rocking while my girlfriend and I get busy. Now the whole campground doesn’t know when we do or don’t get busy. What happens in the camper simply stays in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph barlow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprise at the quality with this product, very well built and surely don't understand why people would pay the higher price for the other ones what more can they do.
customer_reviews.author: R. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Great tripod. Set up quick and easy and hasnt moved si ce we set it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Grover

customer_reviews.title: Works well with what we purchased it for
customer_reviews.text: We use this to stabilize the tongue on our fifth wheel camper
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: Well built and can fit in low clearance situations.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stabilizer that would sit very low for my gooseneck 5th wheel and this fit perfectly with room to spare!! It is very stout and I think it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery, awesome set up, so so so glad we got it stopped all the shake in my fifth wheel
customer_reviews.author: Ty Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Works great to stabilize my toy hauler and keeps it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great construction, easy to put together and handle
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, easy to put together and handle. I own a 2018 Fuzon 43' toy hauler #417. The only problem I have with it is in the spot that I'm at now with the RV it's too short I had to put eight" blokes under each leg. It would be nice if the legs would adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brasser

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. Must Have.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a slight squeak from my front landing gear on my fifth wheel so I purchased this and it eliminated it as well as added more stability to the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Wade H.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a anderson fifth wheel its not  a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a anderson fifth wheel mount so the cup that comes with the stand did not match with the attachment that contects with the tri-pod. One of the threads on the bolts was cross threaded and would not screw on to the bolt. I had to go buy another bolt and nut.. But it makes the front of the Cedar Creek camper stable.
customer_reviews.author: William Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Most useful
customer_reviews.text: Works great, make things more stable, can’t wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark a Miller

product_meta.title: Eaz-Lift Camco King Pin Tripod 5th Wheel Stabilizer, Adjustable from 38.5 50-Inches-(48855)
product_meta.description: Style:5th Wheel Stabilizer Tripod JackCamco's Olympian RV 5th Wheel Stabilizer adds great stability to the front of your 5th wheel. It is for use with 5th wheels whose coaches have a king pin height of 38-1/2" to 50". It features a tripod construction for easy set-up and concave pads for multiple heights. Major height adjustments are made by simply moving the adjustable foot pads inward or outward; minor adjustments are made at the screw level with the provided stabilizing adjusting lever. The 5th wheel stabilizer comes fully assembled and has a steel tube construction with chrome chain. It folds down for easy storage and has a certified 5000 lb. load capacity.
feature_bullets: Adds stability to the front of your 5th wheel
Designed for use with a 5th wheel trailer
Move foot pads for major adjustments; use screw lever for minor adjustments

specifications.Cover Included: Camco Mfg 48855 5Th Wheel Stbl Tripod Jack
